title: Phar Lap: the people's champion [DVD]
creator_credit: Eddie Carnana, Michael Dickinson, Rhett Kirkwood and Hall of Fame Corporation
brief_description: The People’s champion, Phar Lap, is an icon of Australia’s past. This video contains previously unseen footage of the greatest thoroughbred there ever was. Footage is contributed featuring Tommy Woodcock, Harry Telford and American businessman David Davis, as well as including the amazing story of Cups King Bart Cummings, whose record 10 Melbourne Cup triumphs is equally worthy of praise.
